location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no. 1750 of 1822 from Secretary to Government of Bombay to Lieutenant John MacLeod, Resident in the Persian Gulph [Gulf]

mods.abstract: Refers to his letter of 20 November 1822 [no. 1661 of 1822, ff. 123-127] forwarding instructions for the Senior Officer of the Marine in the Persian Gulf regarding withdrawal from Kishm. He conveys to MacLeod the directions of the Governor in Council that he should take an early opportunity of issuing these instructions.
